text:
Bro kaisa hai?
Abhi tak dukh toh hota hai ki summer camp mei nhi hua tera but I can say with full confidence...uska badla tune poora le lia. Wahi "thukra ke mera pyaar....." wali feel mei. Kaafi chaapa tune padhai wagera mei. Aasha hai ki aise hi chaapta rahega aage bhi. Take care!

text:
Aur launde.....201 krna summer mei firse?!
201 ne toh tbh dimaag hi kharaab kr dia tha sahi mei. Kaafi chill out bnda jise kisi cheez ki fikr nhi pr cheezen ho jaati hai sab. Aise hi rehna bro aur kabhi milenge toh pkka se hi....apni MTH walon ki trip bhi pending hai....bc sabke saath kaafi pending cheezen hai....ummed hai with time koi regrets nhi bachenge....see you soon!
author: Shivam  Arya

text:
Mr. Editor! Kya haal chaal? Mamta jeen toh de rhi na?
3rd year start mei jaane hum ek doosre ko....tabse hi shayad classes mei jaana shuru hua tha mera....assingments wagera krna bhi. Saath kaafi padh hai. Tujhse chill bnda nhi deekha and somehow you make things work. Kaafi sahi quality hai and never change. Classes se Nirvana ka safar kaafi pyaara tha. You were one of my go to guys for that stuff wagera. Still remember the night jab to maal laaya aur bahut saare loogon ki raat suhaani ho gyi. Hopefully kabhi mile toh ek baar aur aise hi baithak krni hai. See you soon! :)

text:
Aur hero, 17 se pehle chlna Daman ya baad mei!?ğŸ˜‚

Mei koshish toh kr rha tha pehchaanne ki ki yeh wahi hai na but khairğŸ˜‚. Waha se aaj tak kaafi progress to ki hai humneğŸ˜‚. Teri wajah se hi MTH department mei izzat bacha paya hun mei aur tbh mere kaafi doost bhiğŸ˜‚. Btw thanks for introducing me to that Rajma Chawal in OAT. Kabhi mauka lga toh zaroor khaane chlenge. Aadmi toh bhai tu bahut changa....ekdum saaf aur bakchood. Kaafi saath dia hai poore time mei aur mujhe pkka vishwaas hai, aage bhi aise hi saath rahenge. Yeh corona khatam ho toh kahi chlte hai jldi se....how about "pahad"!?

text:
Yo Bro! Humare bhailoogon ka tech god!
1st year mei hi bhai bn gye the toh pta hi tha kaafi lamba chlna hai sab. Kaafi chill bnnda aur tbh sab kaam time pe niptaa dene wala bhi. Tune apni gaadi mujhe chlaane ko di without and jhijhak uske lie shukriya. Hopefully will meet soon! :)

text:
Yo bro!
Starting mei mei tujhe CSE ka samajhta thağŸ˜‚ you know for all the coding and stuff jo tu krta rehta tha. Kaafi late pta chla ki doosre department wale bhi iss sabme effort daalteğŸ˜‚. But jitna bhi we met, it was a fun and easy time. All the best and see you soon!
author: Shivam  Arya

text:
Ji Goel Bhaiya kaise ho? 
Bhagwaan ka bhala ho aap jaise dev maanus ko humari zindagi mei bheeja. Tumse milne se pehle aur baad mei mere record mei farak dikh hi jaata hai xD. Teri wajah se toh mujhe papers se pehle assignment krke jaane ki aadat lgi thi although late hi sahiğŸ˜‚. Padhai toh saath kaafi kri hi hai but uske alawa bhi bahut sahi launde ho tum. Jab saath baithte the mza sa hi aa jaata tha. CCD mei faltu ki treats se leke BBQ ke all of a sudden play, chhota hi sahi but mza bahut aata tha. Papers ke waqt shiru ka safar tumhari bdi bdi baaton se suhana ho jaata tha. End ke time mei toh saath badminton bhi kheele the. Maan le tu nhi jeet paega mujhse kabhi bhi. I'm pretty handy with a racketğŸ˜‚. 1st year mei toh nhi jaante the but ab regret hota woh time miss ho gya. 
Sahi mei kaafi chill aadmi hai tu. 517 ki quiz se pehle sabka zoom pe aa jaana, mera screen present krna aur sabka teepna(mei bhi teepta hi tha kahi aur se) chhoti baatein hi yaad aaengi. Intern bhi tumne sabse pehle nikaali thi apne group mei....humaare chaapu bhaiyaa. 
Chess ki duniya ke ubharte hue sitaare ko chemical canteen mei 1 chai ke lie rona krna shoobha nhi deta...samjho kuch. Baaki kehne ko toh bahut kuch hai...baaki sab milke. Abhi ke lie ghr pe surakshit rho. Yeh 2nd aur 3rd wave ke beech mei kuch 4 5 mahina ka gap bta reh. Sab apna dabba wagera leke chlte kahi destination WFH peğŸ˜‚. Till then, take care and love you! Milte hai!
author: Shivam  Arya

text: Bro jis tarah quantum nikla hai usse niklna toh nhi hi keh skte but khairğŸ˜‚. Jitna bhi maine mess mei khaana khaaya hai, sab almost teri wajah se. So thankyou for helping me keep my schedule somewhat streamlined!xD Sabse aage room lena in the end smart decision rha merağŸ˜‚. First year se we have known each other and humesha hi mze kie hai. Gaane toh mei full awaaz mei bjaata hi tha, poori wing ko yaad hai ğŸ˜‚. Logon ko acche lge woh toh sahi...warna toh gaali khaatağŸ˜‚. Kaafi time waste ho gya corona ki wajah se but hopefully after this we'll meet really soon! :)

Teri dedication deekhke kaafi motivation aati thi. Squash toh kaafi kheela saath mei aur mza bhi bahut aaya. Mere rackets tere pe abhi bhi hai ya nhi koi idea nhiğŸ˜‚. Kabhi mauka milega toh ek baar firse squash kheelenge.....backhand abhi bhi weak hi hai mera thoughğŸ˜‚. Baaki toh sukhi raho!

Baaki apne group mei hi bakchoodi hua krti thi sabke saath. Haan yaad aaya...tujhse 2 baartreat li thi maine toh....toh sorry. Hopefully we'll meet in future and have a toast! text:
Yo Bro! I'm not sure ki iski word limit ke under aaega sb kuch toh i'll keep the last 4 year ka stuff hi in this. Jaanta toh tujhe 1st class se hoon(usse pehle toh idkğŸ˜‚), although beech beech mei connection toot jaata that. But finally IIT mei aake ek sustained connection develop hua. You have been a brother to me all these year and I mean literally kyuki aapke hi yaha aasra liya krta that mei maximum times. We can debate mera room kaunsa hai but I can safely say, hall 2 ki who wing was more to me than my actual wing. 1st year mei hi sports ki duniya mei apna jhaanda lehraake Sid Goel kuch famous naamo mei see ek ho gya tha. Mere liye toh proud moment tha! Nashe mei aage toh tum nikaal gye the but haan, end mei maine lead cut kr hi di thi teri and I am sure agar 1 saal aur mil jaata campus wala toh tujhse toh pkka hi aage nikal jaata!xD Ab yeh toh bhagwaan ki hi mrzi kahenge ki jo jo tere wingie the mostly loogon ko mei kahi na kahi mil hi chuka tha. Tabhi pta chl gya tha ki yeh group special hoga. Humara aapna BrBaâ™¥. 3rd year mei jo tum loogon ne sadak pe hi room le lia tha....usse better decision mujhe toh nhi lgta poore time mei liya hoga tune....kudos! meri madad ho gyi thi bahut zyada. Teri canteen ka khaate pe aadha contribution mera hi tha agar tujhe nhi pta tohğŸ˜‚. Agar like thoda sa bhi aur space hota room mei toh mei apna ek bed bhi kheech hi leta tere room mei....kyu hi extra effort daalna apne hall jaane ka. Woh daru peeke sabka hagna....accha haan yaad aai Agra trip. Bc tere drame sambhaalte sambhaalte hue hi haalat ho gyi thi meri. But maine bhi badla le hi liya tha baad meiğŸ˜‚. What's life without messing things up a bit. Tere lucknow wale kaand mei probably poora group involve hua tha. Usko describe krne mei kaafi din lg jaenge but haan, woh one of the peaks thağŸ˜‚. Mei bs yahi kahunga ki aajkal mei koi unblock hua hai aur agar tujhe kuch bhi pta ho uske baare mei toh btana. Kaafi ups and downs deekhe hai tune bhi college mei. From having the luck of being just on the right side of grade drop line every fuckin' time to the continuation of some unlucky hockey trend. But I can safely say that we have been on each other's side till date and I am 100% sure we'll be together in future.
Once again, not a friend but a brother! Love You!
author: Shivam  Arya

text: Yo man! One of those other hall 2 buddies jinhe mei behad bhand awastha mei mila hun xD! Still, intern ki party sabki saath hui thi...kaafi accha din tha woh. Fir kahi bhand honge pkka se. Till then...take care!

Tere iitk ke pehle pyaar ke charche toh har jagah hai hi...keep it upğŸ˜‚. Baaki padhai wagera mei thoda dhyaan de lio....thodi woh bhi zaroori hai.
